title: Disruptive: 7 Keys for Working Women Experiencing Hostile Environments
description: Disruptive is Goldyn P. Smith's story of surviving an extremely hostile working environment, becoming a whistleblower, hiring and firing her attorney and litigating against her former employer alone through the Federal District Court and the 11th Circuit Court of Appeals system. Goldyn shares lessons she's learned and offers tips to readers on how to recognize a hostile environment, how to report and protect yourself, and what you should keep in mind while litigating.
author: Goldyn P. Smith
